name: Hollywood Squares
description:
Play with friends and family on the famous "tic-tac-toe" game board occupied by "center squares" Kathy Griffin, Brad Garrett, Martin Mull and Jeffrey Tambor. Host Tom Bergeron asks the celebrities questions, and players judge whether the responses are true or false. Be the first to mark three squares in a row to win! Enjoy hilarious video from the TV show filled with "zingers" to fuel the fun. With a multiplayer mode played on one PS3™ or online through the PlayStation®Network it's never been so much fun to play "tic tac toe" with Hollywood stars!

FEATURES
Authentic graphics, stage and host Tom Bergeron combine to create a true-to-show experience.
More than 1000 questions and tons of videos of the famous "center squares".
3 Modes of Play: Solo, Multiplayer mode on one PS3™, or online through PlayStation®Network.
Bonus Items: Unlock bonus customization options as reward for your progress.
Voice Chat: Chat with other players using any compatible wireless headset for the PlayStation®3 system.
